note:
I am a compulsive writer - mostly stuff of inconsequential nature. Follow at own risk.

Seriously. While I probably don't *technically* suffer from logorrhea, I post a LOT (when I was on Twitter, I ran between 650 and 1200 posts/month). So, "you've been warned!" :)

If you've gotten this far:
• I work in IT …which results in a lot of ranting
• I'm a lifelong music-lover …so, a fair number of posts about shows I go to
• I have no kids, just dogs …so, lotsa pix of them
